disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Frost Shot.

blurb.value: Innate Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her basic attacks to deal increased damage to these targets.

blurb2.value: Critical Slow: Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.

description.value: Innate - Frost Shot: Ashe's basic attacks and abilities apply Frost to enemies, slowing them by 20% − 30% (based on level) for 2 seconds. Basic attacks against enemies with Frost deal 110% (+ (100% +  25%) of critical strike chance) modified damage.

description2.value: Innate - Critical Slow: Ashe's critical strikes deal no extra damage, instead they double Frost's slow strength to 40% − 60% (based on level), decaying over 1 second to its normal strength.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Frost Shot's damage is reduced by Randuin's Omen. Runaan's Hurricane's bolts will deal increased damage from Frost Shot. Runaan's Hurricane's additional bolts will also not deal additional damage on critical strikes. After basic attacking an enemy champion, her next basic attack on that enemy, even if it's no longer slowed, will still trigger Cheap Shot.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Ranger's Focus.

blurb.value: Passive: Ashe builds up Focus by basic attacking enemies.

blurb2.value: Active: At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume them, temporarily increasing her  Attack Speed and transforming her basic attacks into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.

description.value: Passive: While Ranger's Focus is inactive, Ashe's basic attacks on-attack against non-structures grant Focus for 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times, with the duration also refreshing on structure attacks. Stacks are lost by one every 1 second.

description2.value: Active: Ashe gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds and causes each of her basic attacks to fire a flurry of five arrows.

description3.value: Flurries trigger on-hit effects only once, and each arrow deals modified physical damage that benefits from Frost Shots and  life steal.

leveling3.value: Damage Per Arrow:»21 / 22 / 23 / 24 / 25% AD«Total Damage Per Flurry:105 / 110 / 115 / 120 / 125% AD

description4.value: Ranger's Focus resets Ashe's basic attack timer.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Ranger's Focus first bolt deals basic damage with the subsequent 4 bolts dealing a non-reactive damage type (e.g. default damage or proc damage). The entire effect is classified as a basic attack on a script-level, which disables Ravenous Hunter, but is considered an ability for other effects (i.e Sap Magic), which is likely due to a mistaken script-level tag. Although Ranger's Focus has no actual cooldown, 4 stacks of focus are needed before Ranger's Focus can be reactivated. The time before being able to reactivate Ranger's Focus is 6.08 − 1.6 (based on attack speed) seconds. Each arrow from a flurry applies Frost and the bonus damage from Frost Shot is calculated individually per arrow. Similarly, since a flurry is 5 instances of physical damage, Black Cleaver allows her to cleave the enemy target 5 times per flurry. Amumu's Tantrum will reduce each arrow's damage, for a total of 10 − 50 (based on Tantrum's Rank) per flurry. Each additional arrow from Runaan's Hurricane will also split into 5 arrows. The arrows are evenly distributed among secondary enemies but one enemy cannot be hit by more than 5 arrows. The flurry will trigger on-hit effects once to each enemy hit. The flurry applies against structures.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Volley.

effect radius.value: 1200

width.value: 20

blurb.value: Active: Ashe fires 9 arrows in a cone dealing physical damage to enemies. It also applies Critical Slow's slow.

description.value: Active: Ashe fires 9 arrows in a cone in the target direction, each dealing physical damage to the first enemy struck, and applying Critical Slow to enemy champions.

description2.value: Enemies do not take damage from arrows beyond the first.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value:
* The missiles are spawned in a straight horizontal line 75 units in front of Ashe, with a total width of 100 units.
 Between each missile spawn location is a distance of 12.5 units.

 Volley fires from Ashe's location at the end of the cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Hawkshot.

blurb.value: Active: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map. The spirit exposes the area along its path and a large area at its destination.

description.value: Passive: Ashe periodically stocks a Hawkshot charge, up to a maximum of 2.

description2.value: Active: Ashe sends a hawk spirit toward the target location, revealing the area along its path「 repeatedly for 0.5 seconds after every 100 units traveled 」「 for effectively up-to 1.8 seconds at any location 」and at its destination for 5 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value:
* Hawkshot's recharge timer seems to start at the beginning of the game, even prior to ranking the ability, but upon actually ranking the ability, it starts with one charge and the recharge timer starts from 0.
 Hawkshot will ping enemy champions it spots if allies didn't already have vision of them, and put a 'revealed' visual effect on them for 2.75 seconds, but does not actually reveal the units in particular, and is removed if the champion leaves the area.
 Hawkshot will grant assist credit if a previously-unseen enemy champion is killed within 10 seconds of being revealed by the ability.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Enchanted Crystal Arrow.

effect radius.value: 400 / 350

width.value: 260

blurb.value: Active: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy champion, it deals magic damage and stuns them what last longer the farther the arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take magic damage and are slowed.

description.value: Active: Ashe fires a massive arrow of ice in the target direction, granting brief sight of the area it flies through every 1 second. The arrow shatters upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage, stunning them for 1 − 3.5 (based on distance traveled) seconds, and revealing the area around them for 1 second.

description2.value: Enemies surrounding the main target are struck for 50% damage, but only slowed by Frost Shot.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value:
* The minimap icon of Enchanted Crystal Arrow can be seen by Ashe and all her allies.
 The Enchanted Crystal Arrow is fired from the original cast location upon completion of the cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
